title: PA man in custody after Mexico flight with 16 y.o. girl
text:
PA man in custody after Mexico flight with 16 y.o. girl 2:30pm EDT - 01:18 
The wife of a Pennsylvania man is refusing to answer his calls from jail after he was arrested in Mexico with their daughter's teenaged friend. Linda So reports.   
The wife of a Pennsylvania man is refusing to answer his calls from jail after he was arrested in Mexico with their daughter's teenaged friend. Linda So reports.  //reut.rs/2pnXVAI
